name: warren-product-suite
description: Warren Product Suite - Complete community intelligence and engagement platform

scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:build-burrows && npm run build:hollow && npm run build:hatch
scripts.stop: docker-compose down && pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true
scripts.setup: npm run setup:packages && npm run setup:apps
scripts.setup:apps: cd apps/build-burrows/frontend && npm install && cd ../../hollow && npm install && cd ../hatch && npm install
scripts.lint:apps: cd apps/hollow && npm run lint && cd ../hatch && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:packages && npm run typecheck:apps
scripts.typecheck:apps: cd apps/hollow && npm run build && cd ../hatch && npm run build
scripts.check-all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
